data.text: “Baba na du si yɔ fũu kple ŋutasesẽ,
Mesea ame aɖeke ƒe gbe o,
Eƒe kplɔlawo le abe dzata
Eƒe nyagblɔɖilawo doa wo ɖokuiwo ɖe dzi,
Ke Yehowae nye dzɔdzɔetɔ le wo dome,
“Metsrɔ̃ dukɔ geɖewo,
Megblɔ na du la be,
eya ta mikpɔ nye asi nu,”
“Ɣe ma ɣi la, makɔ nye amewo ƒe nuyiwo ŋu,
Tso Kus tɔsisi la godo ke, nye subɔlawo
Le ɣe ma ɣi la,
Ke magblẽ ame siwo nye ame fafawo
Israel ƒe ame mamlɛawo magawɔ vɔ̃ o,
O Zion vinyɔnu, dzi ha, O Israel, do ɣli,
Yehowa ɖe wò tohehewo ɖa,
Gbe ma gbe la,
Yehowa wò Mawu la li kpli wò,
“Maɖe konyifafa siwo nɔa miaƒe takpegbewo la ɖa le mia ŋu,
Le ɣe ma ɣi la, matu nu
Ɣe ma yi la, maƒo mia nu ƒu;
